Key Match Events: The Chicago Cubs blew a 6-0 lead and lost on a heartbreaking dropped ball against the Atlanta Braves.
Pre-Game Insights: Manager David Ross is confident that his club will rise to the occasion.
The team knows how important the final stretch of the season is.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Chicago Cubs are now projected to miss the MLB Playoffs when the regular season ends.
The Cubs are a half-game up on the Miami Marlins entering Wednesday's games.
